org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot
Class KijiCellRewriter

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot.KijiPivoter
      org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot.KijiCellRewriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, KeyValueStoreClient
@ApiAudience.Public
@ApiStability.Experimental
public class KijiCellRewriter
extends KijiPivoter

Pivot M/R job to rewrite cells in a Kiji table.

KijiCellRewriter is an example of a Pivot M/R job to rewrite cells in a Kiji table by performing a chain of compatible Avro conversions.
This job rewrites the cells from a map-type family or a fully-qualified column at a time. The rewritten cells may be written either to the same column or family of the input Kiji table, or to the same column or family of a different Kiji table, potentially in a different Kiji instance.
An example demonstrating how to use this job is available in TestKijiCellRewriter.

This method may be called multiple times, including before KijiPivoter.setup(KijiContext).

rewriteCell

protected <T,U> org.kiji.schema.DecodedCell<T> rewriteCell(org.kiji.schema.DecodedCell<U> cell)
                                              throws IOException
Rewrites a cell.

This method is meant to be overloaded in case custom cell rewriting rules are necessary.

Type Parameters:
U - type of the input cell to rewrite.
T - type to rewrite the input cell into.
Parameters:
cell - Original value of the cell.
Returns:
the new rewritten value of the cell, or the original cell value if no translation rules apply.
Throws:
IOException - on I/O error.

convertAvro

public static <T,U> org.kiji.schema.DecodedCell<T> convertAvro(org.kiji.schema.DecodedCell<U> original,
                                                               org.apache.avro.Schema schema)
                                                  throws IOException
Converts an Avro datum using a new (compatible) Avro schema.

Type Parameters:
U - type of the input cell to rewrite.
T - type to rewrite the input cell into.
Parameters:
original - Original Avro datum with its schema.
schema - New Avro schema to convert the datum into.
Returns:
the Avro datum converted into the specified new schema.
Throws:
IOException - on I/O error.
